thread.title: Account Executive - NASCAR - Sports Marketing

title: Account Executive - NASCAR - Sports Marketing
text: Posted/Updated: 10-16-2015 Brief Job Description: Are you passionate about event execution and NASCAR? We are hiring an Account Executive on a NASCAR client.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
